name: BONES: A Short Interactive Story
description:
BONES is a short interactive, mostly linear, story.

You awaken in total darkness. What lies ahead? How did you get here? And what is that weird sound?

Let's find out.

I encourage you to play in fullscreen mode (F11 in most browsers) and with headphones on. 

NOTICE: This story contains some spooks and somewhat gruesome description of player's death.

P.S. This game uses audio and pictures, so about 85 Mb of traffic will be used.

P.S.#2 Since English is not my primary language, there might me some grammatical errors. If you find some and you would like to share them with me, so I can fix them, please feel free to write them in the comments or in a email to flatotrip(at)gmail(dot)com

Thank you and enjoy!
